title: How to Draw a Cupcake Chair

steps.headline: Draw two lines with a curve under them.
Draw a wavy line on top.
steps.description: It should look something like an upside-down umbrella.

steps.headline: Draw vertical lines through the umbrella.
steps.description: You have now completed the cup part.

steps.headline: Draw a rounded curve on top.
Draw wavy, uneven lines on top of the curve.
Draw a giant pretzel behind the cupcake.
Color in your picture using any colors you like.

text: Draw two lines with a curve under them.  Draw a wavy line on top. It should look something like an upside-down umbrella. Draw vertical lines through the umbrella. You have now completed the cup part. Draw a rounded curve on top.  Draw wavy, uneven lines on top of the curve. This will be the frosting. Draw a giant pretzel behind the cupcake. This is the chair's back. Erase extra sketch lines.  Color in your picture using any colors you like.
